SELECT dm.`devices_manage_id`, dm.`manage_code`, dm.`device_type_id`, dt.`name` as `name`, dm.`model_name`, dm.`location`, dm.`manager_operator_id`, dm.`manage_level`, dm.`asset_no`, dm.`products_code`, dm.`brand_id`, b.`name` as `brand_name`, dm.`section_id`, dm.`line_id`, dm.`position_id`, dm.`responsible_operator_id`, ot.name as responsible_operator, dm.`import_date`, dm.`provide_date`, dm.`waste_date`, dm.`delete_flg`, dm.`updated_by`, dm.`updated_time`, dm.`status`, dm.`comment` FROM `devices_manage` dm JOIN `device_type` dt ON dm.device_type_id = dt.device_type_id LEFT JOIN brand b ON dm.brand_id = b.brand_id left join operator ot ON dm.responsible_operator_id = ot.OPERATOR_ID WHERE dm.`devices_manage_id` = #{devices_manage_id} ;
mapper.update: INSERT INTO `devices_manage` (`manage_code`, `measuring_instrument_manage_code`, `device_type_id`, `model_name`, `location`, `manager_operator_id`, `manage_level`, `asset_no` `products_code`, `brand_id`, `section_id`, `line_id`, `position_id`, `responsible_operator_id`, `import_date`, `provide_date`, `waste_date`, `delete_flg`, `updated_by`, `updated_time`, `status`, `comment`) SELECT #{manage_code} as manage_code, `odm`.`measuring_instrument_manage_code`, `odm`.`device_type_id`, `odm`.`model_name`, `odm`.`location`, `odm`.`manager_operator_id`, `odm`.`manage_level`, `odm`.`asset_no`, `odm`.`products_code`, `odm`.`brand_id`, `odm`.`section_id`, `odm`.`line_id`, `odm`.`position_id`, `odm`.`responsible_operator_id`, current_date as `import_date`, current_date as `provide_date`, `odm`.`waste_date`, `odm`.`delete_flg`, #{updated_by} as updated_by, current_timestamp as updated_time, 1 as `status`, '' as `comment` FROM `devices_manage` odm WHERE odm.devices_manage_id=#{devices_manage_id}

UPDATE devices_manage SET waste_date=current_date, updated_by=#{updated_by}, updated_time=current_timestamp, status= 2, comment = concat(comment, '\n使用者替换于', current_date) WHERE devices_manage_id=#{devices_manage_id}
mapper.select: SELECT dt.device_type_id, dt.name, sum(pow(2, dhc.classification)) as classification FROM devices_manage dm JOIN device_type dt ON dm.device_type_id = dt.device_type_id LEFT JOIN device_hazardous_caution dhc ON dt.device_type_id = dhc.device_type_id WHERE dm.delete_flg = 0 and dm.section_id =#{section_id} and dm.position_id =#{position_id} and status in (1 , 5) and manage_level = 1 GROUP BY dt.device_type_id ;

SELECT devices_manage_id, manage_code, dt.name, model_name FROM devices_manage dm JOIN device_type dt ON dm.device_type_id = dt.device_type_id WHERE dm.delete_flg=0 AND status in (1, 4, 5) ORDER BY manage_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `device_manage_record` ( `manage_id`, `old_manage_code`, `new_manage_code`, `old_position_id`, `new_position_id`, updated_by, updated_time, `event`) VALUES ( #{devices_manage_id}, #{old_manage_code}, #{manage_code}, #{old_position_id}, #{position_id}, #{updated_by}, current_timestamp, #{event});
mapper.select: SELECT `dmr_key`, `old_manage_code`, `new_manage_code` as manage_code, pos_o.process_code as `old_position_id`, pos_n.process_code, `event`, op.job_no as `updated_by`, dmr.`updated_time` FROM `device_manage_record` dmr LEFT JOIN position pos_o on dmr.old_position_id = pos_o.position_id LEFT JOIN position pos_n on dmr.new_position_id = pos_n.position_id JOIN operator op on dmr.updated_by = op.operator_id WHERE `manage_id` = #{devices_manage_id} AND dmr.`updated_time` between #{provide_date_start} and #{provide_date_end} ORDER BY dmr.updated_time;
